    ‚ÄúIf you can dream it, you can do it.‚Äù
    ‚Äî Walt Disney

    Too technical to be artists, too creative to be engineers. That‚Äôs the curse of researchers in graphics and TAs.

    Hello! My name is Elena, and I am a computer graphics enthusiast.

    I am currently working as a postdoctoral research scientist at the University of Padova, leading research in Computer Vision, particularly on foundational deep learning and 3D Gaussian splatting. Parallely, I am studying Technical Art attending a Houdini course.

    üéì Research & Academic Path

    After earning my M.Sc. in TLC Engineering in 2021, I did a Ph.D. in Information Engineering at the University of Padova, where I focused on visual representations for scene understanding. During my Ph.D., I:

    • Published over 10 papers in international conferences and journals
      (SIGGRAPH, ICASSP, ICIP, IROS, TMM, etc.),
    • Spent several months at Samsung Research UK, where I co-authored two papers and contributed to a patent,
    • Supervised graduate theses, and supported teaching across several Master‚Äôs courses,
    • Contributed to applied projects in XR, education, and interdisciplinary research.

    üé® Creative Technology & Digital Arts

    Alongside my academic work, I‚Äôve always been drawn to the creative side of technology.
    In 2024, I attended the BigRock Master in Computer Graphics, where I honed my skills in digital art, real-time rendering, and storytelling, using tools like Maya, ZBrush, and Unreal Engine.

    üöÄ Vision & Future Goals

    I see myself at the intersection of research, creative technologies, and education.
    I‚Äôm passionate about blending the precision of mathematics with the creativity of digital arts. My goal is to develop systems that not only perceive and interact with the world but also enable intuitive and expressive experiences, making advanced technologies more approachable and impactful. I‚Äôm especially interested in projects that combine AI, vision, and graphics whether in academia, R&D, or the creative industry.
